targets.expr: avg by(host_name) (sum by(cpu) (rate(system_cpu_time_seconds_total{cloud_region="$cloud_region", host_name="$host_name", state!="idle"}[$__rate_interval]))) / avg by(host_name) (sum by(cpu) (rate(system_cpu_time_seconds_total{cloud_region="$cloud_region", host_name="$host_name"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(cpu) (rate(system_cpu_time_seconds_total{cloud_region="$cloud_region", host_name="$host_name", state!="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by(cpu) (rate(system_cpu_time_seconds_total{cloud_region="$cloud_region", host_name="$host_name"}[$__rate_interval]))
